content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (0, 0) with warnings of being out of fuel and having 5 iron ore in the furnace source, and 4 copper plates in the furnace result.

### Furnace at position (1, 0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (1, 0) with 49 coal in the fuel, 34 iron ore in the furnace source, and 11 iron plates in the furnace result.

### Furnace at position (3, 0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (3, 0) with 6 coal in the fuel, warnings of having no ingredients to smelt, and 19 copper plates in the furnace result.

### Lab at position unknown
Consists of a lab with no power and an electrical id of 2040, and an input of 20 automation science packs.

### Electricity Group
Consists of an electricity group with id 2040, and poles at positions (2.5, -0.5) and (4.5, 0.5) with a voltage of 0.

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
- Make sure the furnace has the required items to extract before attempting extraction.
- Ensure the furnace is not out of fuel before attempting extraction.
- Check the furnace source and result to ensure the items are available for extraction.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the entity is in the inventory before attempting to place it.
- Check the position where the entity is being placed to ensure it is not occupied by another entity.

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure all required sub-ingredients are available before attempting to craft an item.
- Check the recipe requirements to ensure the correct crafting machine or smelting in a furnace is used.

### Errors when smelting iron
- Ensure the furnace has the required iron ore to smelt before attempting smelting.
- Check the furnace source and result to ensure the iron plates are available after smelting.

### Errors when inserting items into a furnace
- Ensure the furnace has enough space to insert the items before attempting to insert.
- Check the furnace's current items to avoid overfilling.

### Errors when crafting a steam engine
- Ensure all required ingredients (iron plate, iron gear wheel, pipe) are available before attempting to craft a steam engine.
- Check the recipe requirements to ensure the correct crafting machine or smelting in a furnace is used.

### Errors due to nil value
- Ensure all variables are properly initialized before attempting to use them.
- Check for any missing or incorrect data that may cause a nil value error.

### Errors when crafting a pipe
- Ensure the recipe for pipe is enabled and has the correct ingredients.
- Check that the crafting machine is available and has enough space to craft the pipe.

### Errors when placing a steam engine
- Ensure the steam engine is in the inventory before attempting to place it.
- Check the position where the steam engine is being placed to ensure it is not occupied by another entity.

### Errors when crafting a steam engine due to missing ingredients
- Ensure all required ingredients (iron plate, iron gear wheel, pipe) are available before attempting to craft a steam engine.
- Check the recipe requirements to ensure the correct crafting machine or smelting in a furnace is used.
